vg.civcraft.mc.citadel

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • vg.civcraft.mc.citadel.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    Just a useful class with general and misplaced methods that can be called from anywhere.

      • createPlayerReinforcement

        public static PlayerReinforcement createPlayerReinforcement(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                            vg.civcraft.mc.namelayer.group.Group g,
                                            org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                                            ReinforcementType type)
        Creates a PlayerReinforcement or returns null if if player doesn't have the required requirements.
        Parameters:
        The - Player who created the reinforcement.
        The - Group this reinforcement belongs too.
        The - Block this reinforcement is occurring on.
        The - ReinforcementType that is being reinforced on the block.
        Returns:
        The PlayerReinforcement that comes from these parameters or null if certain checks failed.

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • isDroppedReinforcementBlock

        public static PlayerReinforcement isDroppedReinforcementBlock(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack,
                                              org.bukkit.Location loc)
        Returns the Reinforcement of a block if it was previously a reinforcement. Importantly though if a group that this block was associated with gets deleted this block when placed will not belong to anyone.
        Parameters:
        The - player placing the block
        The - stack the player is placing from
        The - location where the block is being placed
        Returns:
        The PlayerReiforcement associated with this block

        If a reinforcement is exploded checks if it has a reinforcement on it or not.
        Parameters:
        The - block that exploded.
        Returns:
        True if there is a reinforcement.
